Structs/PolarSensorSetting/SettingType.h.name: rangeMilliunit
Structs/PolarSensorSetting/SettingType.h.abstract: range with min and max allowed values

Structs/PolarOfflineRecordingTrigger.htm.name: triggerFeatures
Structs/PolarOfflineRecordingTrigger.htm.abstract: Dictionary containing the PolarDeviceDataType keys for enabled triggers. Dictionary

Structs/PolarOfflineRecordingEntry.html#.name: date
Structs/PolarOfflineRecordingEntry.html#.abstract: The date and time of the recording entry i.e. the moment recording is started

Structs/AutomaticSamples.html.name: AutomaticSamples
Structs/AutomaticSamples.html.abstract: Copyright © 2024 Polar Electro Oy. All rights reserved.

Structs/PolarRecordingSecret.html.name: PolarRecordingSecret
Structs/PolarRecordingSecret.html.abstract: Polar recording secret is used to encrypt the recording.

Structs/UserIdentifierType.html.name: UserIdentifierType
Structs/UserIdentifierType.html.abstract: Copyright © 2024 Polar Electro Oy. All rights reserved.

Structs.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk0A21DeviceR.name: PolarDeviceRestApiServices
Structs.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk0A21DeviceR.abstract: Lists REST API services and corresponding paths

Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html#/s:11.name: getRestApiDescription(identifier:path:)
Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html#/s:11.abstract: Get details related to particular REST API.

Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html#/s:11.name: putNotification(identifier:notification:path:)
Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html#/s:11.abstract: Notify device via a REST API in the device.

Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html#/s:11.name: receiveRestApiEvents(identifier:)
Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html#/s:11.abstract: Streams for received device REST API events parameters decoded as given Decodable type T endlessly.

Protocols/PolarSleepApi.html#/s:11PolarB.name: getSleepData(identifier:fromDate:toDate:)
Protocols/PolarSleepApi.html#/s:11PolarB.abstract: Get sleep analysis data for a given period.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: getAvailableOnlineStreamDataTypes(_:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Get the data types available in this device for online streaming

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: requestStreamSettings(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Request the stream settings available in current operation mode. This request shall be used before the stream is started

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: requestFullStreamSettings(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Request full steam settings capabilities. The request returns the all capabilities of the requested streaming feature not limited by the current operation mode.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startHrStreaming(_:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start heart rate stream. Heart rate stream is stopped if the connection is closed,

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startEcgStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start the ECG (Electrocardiography) stream. ECG stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startAccStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start ACC (Accelerometer) stream. ACC stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startGyroStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start Gyro stream. Gyro stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs during start or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startMagnetometerStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start magnetometer stream. Magnetometer stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startPpgStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start optical sensor PPG (Photoplethysmography) stream. PPG stream is stopped if the connection is closed, error occurs or stream is disposed.

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startTemperatureStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start temperature stream. Temperature stream is stopped if the connection is closed,

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startPressureStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start pressure stream. Pressure stream is stopped if the connection is closed,

Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.name: startSkinTemperatureStreaming(_:settings:)
Protocols/PolarOnlineStreamingApi.html#/.abstract: Start skin temperature stream. Skin temperature stream is stopped if the connection is closed,

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: getAvailableOfflineRecordingDataTypes(_:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Get the data types available in this device for offline recording

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: requestOfflineRecordingSettings(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Request the offline recording settings available in current operation mode. This request shall be used before the offline recording is started

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: requestFullOfflineRecordingSettings(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Request all the settings available in the device. The request returns the all capabilities of the requested streaming feature not limited by the current operation mode.

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: listOfflineRecordings(_:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: List offline recordings stored in the device.

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: getSubRecordingCount(identifier:entry:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Fetch number sub recordings in recording from the device.

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: listSplitOfflineRecordings(_:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: List split offline recordings stored in the device.

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: removeOfflineRecords(_:entry:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Removes offline recording with all the subrecordings from the device. Empty parent directories are removed up to day directory.

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: setOfflineRecordingTrigger(_:trigger:secret:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Sets the offline recording triggers for a given Polar device. The offline recording can be started automatically in the device by setting the triggers.

Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.name: getOfflineRecordingTriggerSetup(_:)
Protocols/PolarOfflineRecordingApi.html#.abstract: Retrieves the current offline recording trigger setup in the device.

Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.name: startRecording(_:exerciseId:interval:sampleType:)
Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.abstract: Request start recording. Supported only by Polar H10. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.name: stopRecording(_:)
Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.abstract: Request stop for current recording. Supported only by Polar H10. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.name: requestRecordingStatus(_:)
Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.abstract: Request current recording status. Supported only by Polar H10. Requires polarFileTransfer feature.

Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.name: fetchStoredExerciseList(_:)
Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.abstract: Api for fetching stored exercises list from Polar H10 device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. This API is working for Polar OH1 and Polar Verity Sense devices too, however in those devices recording of exercise requires that sensor is registered to Polar Flow account.

Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.name: fetchExercise(_:entry:)
Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.abstract: Api for fetching a single exercise from Polar H10 device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. This API is working for Polar OH1 and Polar Verity Sense devices too, however in those devices recording of exercise requires that sensor is registered to Polar Flow account.

Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.name: removeExercise(_:entry:)
Protocols/PolarH10OfflineExerciseApi.htm.abstract: Api for removing single exercise from Polar H10 device. Requires polarFileTransfer feature. This API is working for Polar OH1 and Polar Verity Sense devices too, however in those devices recording of exercise requires that sensor is registered to Polar Flow account.

Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceFeaturesObser.name: bleSdkFeatureReady(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceFeaturesObser.abstract: The feature is available in this device and it is ready. Called only for the features which are specified in [PolarBleApi] construction.

Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceHrObserver.ht.name: hrValueReceived(_:data:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiDeviceHrObserver.ht.abstract: HR notification received. Notice when using OH1 and PPI stream is started this callback will produce 0 hr.

Protocols/PolarBleApiPowerStateObserver..name: blePowerOff()
Protocols/PolarBleApiPowerStateObserver..abstract: Ble powered off event, no further actions are needed from the application.

Protocols/PolarBleApiObserver.html#/s:11.name: deviceConnecting(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApiObserver.html#/s:11.abstract: Callback when connection attempt is started to device

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: cleanup()
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: remove all known devices, which are not in use

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: polarFilter(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Enable or disable polar filter.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: startAutoConnectToDevice(_:service:polarDeviceType:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Start connecting to a nearby device. PolarBleApiObservers polarDeviceConnected is

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: connectToDevice(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Request a connection to a Polar device. Invokes PolarBleApiObservers polarDeviceConnected.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: disconnectFromDevice(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Disconnect from the current Polar device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: searchForDevice()
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Start searching for Polar device(s)

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: startListenForPolarHrBroadcasts(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Start listening the heart rate from Polar devices when subscribed.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: isFeatureReady(_:feature:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Check if the feature is ready.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: setLocalTime(_:time:zone:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Set local time to device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: getLocalTime(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Get current time in device. Note, the H10 is not supporting time read.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: getDiskSpace(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Get PolarDiskSpaceData from device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: setLedConfig(_:ledConfig:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Set [LedConfig] to enable or disable blinking LEDs (Verity Sense 2.2.1+).

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: doFactoryReset(_:preservePairingInformation:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Perform factory reset to given device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: doRestart(_:preservePairingInformation:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Perform restart to given device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: getSDLogConfiguration(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Get SD log configuration from a device (SDLOGS.BPB)

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: setSDLogConfiguration(_:logConfiguration:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Set SD log configuration to a device (SDLOGS.BPB)

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: doFirstTimeUse(_:ftuConfig:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Set [FtuConfig] for device

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: isFtuDone(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Check if the First Time Use has been done for the given Polar device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: setWarehouseSleep(_:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Set the device to warehouse sleep state. Factory reset will be performed in order to enable the setting.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: getPolarUserDeviceSettings(identifier:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Get Device User Settings to a device from proto in device (UDEVSET.BPB)

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: setPolarUserDeviceSettings(_:polarUserDeviceSettings:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Set Device User Settings to a device (UDEVSET.BPB)

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: deleteStoredDeviceData(_:dataType:until:)
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Delete data [PolarStoredDataType] from a device.

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: observer
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Common GAP (Generic access profile) observer

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: deviceInfoObserver
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Device info observer for DIS (Device information service) and BAS (Battery service) GATT (Generic attributes) client

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: deviceHrObserver
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Device observer for HR GATT client

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: powerStateObserver
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Bluetooth power state observer

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: deviceFeaturesObserver
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Device features ready observer

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: isBlePowered
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: Helper to check if Ble is currently powered

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: logger
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: optional logger set to get traces from sdk

Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.name: automaticReconnection
Protocols/PolarBleApi.html#/s:11PolarBle.abstract: optional disable or enable automatic reconnection, by default it is enabled

Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.name: getActiveTime(identifier:fromDate:toDate:)
Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.abstract: Get active time for a given period.

Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.name: get247HrSamples(identifier:fromDate:toDate:)
Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.abstract: Get 24/7 heart rate samples for a given period.

Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.name: getNightlyRecharge(identifier:fromDate:toDate:)
Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.abstract: Get nightly recharge for a given period.

Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.name: getSkinTemperature(identifier:fromDate:toDate:)
Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html#/s:11Pol.abstract: Get skin temperature for a given period.

Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html.name: PolarActivityApi
Protocols/PolarActivityApi.html.abstract: Protocol defining methods to get steps for a given period.

Protocols/PolarSleepApi.html.abstract: Protocol defining methods to get Polar Sleep Data

Protocols/PolarRestServiceApi.html.abstract: Methods related to working with services conforming to SAGRFC95 Service discovery over PFTP

Enums/PolarErrors.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk0.name: polarBleSdkInternalException(description:)
Enums/PolarErrors.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk0.abstract: Polar BLE SDK internal exception indicating something went wrong in SDK internal logic

Enums/SampleType.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk10.name: hr
Enums/SampleType.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk10.abstract: recording type to use is hr in BPM

Enums/SampleType.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk10.name: rr
Enums/SampleType.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk10.abstract: recording type to use is rr interval

Enums/PpgDataType.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk1.name: ppg21
Enums/PpgDataType.html#/s:11PolarBleSdk1.abstract: 8 green + 6 red + 6 ir channels + 1 status channel

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_hr
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Hr feature to receive hr and rr data from Polar or any other BLE device via standard HR BLE service

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_device_info
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Device information feature to receive sw information from Polar or any other BLE device

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_battery_info
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Feature to receive battery level info from Polar or any other BLE device

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_online_streaming
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Polar sensor streaming feature to stream live online data. For example hr, ecg, acc, ppg, ppi, etc…

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_offline_recording
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Polar offline recording feature to record offline data to Polar device without continuous BLE connection.

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_h10_exercise_recording
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: H10 exercise recording feature to record exercise data to Polar H10 device without continuous BLE connection.

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_device_time_setup
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Feature to read and set device time in Polar device

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_sdk_mode
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: In SDK mode the wider range of capabilities are available for the online stream or offline recoding than in normal operation mode.

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_led_animation
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Feature to enable or disable SDK mode blinking LED animation.

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.name: feature_polar_activity_data
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html#/s:11Polar.abstract: Feature to receive activity data from Polar device.

Enums/PolarDeviceDataType.html.name: PolarDeviceDataType
Enums/PolarDeviceDataType.html.abstract: Data types available in Polar devices for online streaming or offline recording.

Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html.name: PolarBleSdkFeature
Enums/PolarBleSdkFeature.html.abstract: Features available in Polar BLE SDK library

Enums/PolarActivityDataType.html.name: PolarActivityDataType
Enums/PolarActivityDataType.html.abstract: The activity recording data types available in Polar devices.

Enums/PolarOfflineRecordingTriggerMode.h.name: PolarOfflineRecordingTriggerMode
Enums/PolarOfflineRecordingTriggerMode.h.abstract: Polar offline recording trigger mode. Offline recording trigger can be used to start the offline recording automatically in device, based on selected trigger mode.

Classes/PolarSkinTemperatureData/SkinTem.name: SkinTemperatureSensorLocation
Classes/PolarSkinTemperatureData/SkinTem.abstract: SL_DISTAL, sensor is located away from torso, for example on wrist

Classes/PolarBleApiDefaultImpl.html.abstract: Class to provide the default implementation of the Polar Ble API
